description.description: Description of where or what the light applies to.

worldX.description: The non-instanced world X coordinate to spawn the light on. Used in combination with worldY and plane.

worldY.description: The non-instanced world Y coordinate to spawn the light on. Used in combination with worldX and plane.

plane.description: The world Z coordinate, or plane to spawn the light on. Used in combination with worldX and worldY.

alignment.description: Where to place the light in relation to what it's attached to, be it an NPC, object or world location.

height.description: The height in scene units (128 per tile) to place the light above the current tile or entity base height.

radius.description: How far the light should reach in all directions.

color.description: The RGB color values of the light, normally in the range 0-255. Decimals are allowed. Color space: sRGB.

type.description: Specify the animation to apply to the light. Defaults to STATIC.

duration.description: The time to complete one cycle of the light type's animation. Currently only affects PULSE lights.

range.description: The distance range to vary the light's radius by according to the light's animation.

fadeInDuration.description: The time in milliseconds until the light is fully active after spawning.

npcIds.description: A set of NPC IDs or NpcID keys to apply the light to.

objectIds.description: A set of object IDs or ObjectID keys to apply the light to.

projectileIds.description: A set of projectile IDs to apply the light to.

graphicsObjectIds.description: A set of graphics object IDs to apply the light to.
